mapper.insert: INSERT INTO easyusers(email, easyuser_pass, easyuser_name, nick_name, phone_num, sex, birth, easyuser_type, easyuser_num) VALUES(#{email}, #{easyuser_pass}, #{easyuser_name}, #{nick_name}, #{phone_num}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{easyuser_type}, #{easyuser_num})
mapper.update: UPDATE easyuser SET easyuser_pass=#{easyuser_pass} WHERE email=#{email}
